Name: Milk Chocolate Hazelnut Bonbon
Description: A sugary bonbon made with a hard milk chocolate shell over a hazelnut and coffee creme.

NameLocalization.zh: 牛奶巧克力榛子咖啡夹心

DescriptionLocalization.ko: 단단한 밀크초콜렛에 커피크림을 채우고 헤이즐넛을 곁들인 달콤한 봉봉.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Ein zuckerhaltiger Bonbon aus einer harten Milchschokoladenschale über einer Haselnuss-Kaffee-Creme.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 稍硬的牛奶巧克力包裹着榛子以及咖啡为成分的奶油。榛子带有的香味加上香醇浓厚的咖啡，再加上牛奶巧克力为外层，妙哉。
